messages.subject: Non-Violent Communication recommendation
messages.msgSnippet: A new list member sent this, in reference to communicating with teens. -=-May I suggest Marshall Rosenberg s book Non-Violent Communication. Not sure if anyone
messages.messageBody:
A new list member sent this, in reference to communicating with teens.

-=-May I suggest Marshall Rosenberg's book Non-Violent Communication.
Not sure if anyone has heard of it...wonderful ideas on communicating
with our loved ones! -=-

I wanted to send her a link to a recent discussion on this topic, but
I didn't find it. Was it somewhere besides here? (If there's a pre-
saved discussion on non-violent communication that would be good to
link here. Sorry I didn't find it. I'm hoping someone here can.)

Sandra
